name: EVOC Bike Travel Bag XL
description: Most bike travel cases are awesome in transit but a bulky nuisance once you arrive. Not this bag. Built to fit fat bikes and plus bikes, it utilizes your bike’s strongest components and combines them with removable stiffener rods to form a robust internal frame, then it rolls up for compact storage at your destination.Made of strong, waterproof, PVC-free tarpaulin fabric.High-wear areas are reinforced with polyurethane-coated polyester.10mm foam padding, crush-resistant polyethylene panels in key areas, plus a stable, hard plastic undercarriage.In-line skate wheels for smooth rolling through airports and train stations.Main compartment has a pad to support chain stay and protect drive train, a cinch-down pocket for the forks, an adjustable wrap pad for the handlebars, and hook-and-loop wraps for the frame frame.2 zippered exterior pockets hold 26+, 27+ or 29+ wheels.Webbing grab handles for easy handling.Lockable zippers.Business card pocket on exterior for easy luggage ID.
